name: Keep Them Alive [ Beta ]
description:
**Patch 0.12**
Fixed a bug where the note wouldn't show up.
Balancing weapons

**Patch 0.11**
This patch was a bugfix!
Music plays now in main menu
Spawned bodies in the menu don't dissapear
Players can't move after death
Fixed reloading issues

**Gameplay**
Explore the dungeons!
Fight the enemies!
Get The Fuel!
Save the hospital!

**Controls**
WSAD - Movement
Mouse - Aim
Mouse Left Click - Shoot
Mouse Right Click - Interact
R - Reload

Authors:

@Bajtix - Code, models, animations, textures, bugs

REafiki - Music, icons.

dragster - Models, textures
